_comment: Rule MCP Server - Standard Configuration Template
_instructions: 1. Copy this file to your MCP settings directory
2. Replace ${PROJECT_PATH} with the full path to your RuleMCPServer directory
3. Replace ${RULE_SERVER_URL} with your server URL (default: http://localhost:18080)
4. Replace ${MCP_API_KEY} with your API key (optional, leave empty for public access)
5. Remove these comment lines before using

rule-mcp-server.description: Standard MCP Server for Rule Management - provides coding rules and validation tools for AI agents
